modules.description: Provides functions to generate pretty-printing code for OCaml types using ppxlib. Works with type definitions, constructors, and fields to produce custom show implementations. Used to automatically create readable string representations for complex data structures in compiled code.

This module specializes in generating code for pretty-printing and serialization of OCaml abstract syntax tree (AST) elements, including expressions, attributes, and type definitions. It operates on Ppxlib and Astlib AST types, producing structured output for records, tuples, variants, and built-in types with customizable formatting. Use cases include deriving show functions, generating value bindings, and handling path-aware transformations during code synthesis.
